entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up FileSystemWatcher tests use of temp files #68430
  • How to control HttpConnectionPool throttle? #68423
  • Pkcs12Kdf can stack overflow with an exceptionally large password #68419
  • Support for HTTPS proxy #68416
  • Improve handling of lazy loops in regex source generator / compiler #68415
    7.0.0
  • Looping method call in a BackgroundWorker does an access violation instead of a StackOverflowException #68413
  • JIT_PInvoke asm stubs missing for i386 #68411
  • [HTTP/3] Typo in the header's name #68407
    7.0.0
  • ECMA-335 clarification about assignable-to relation #68403
  • DevToolsProxy::Run: Exception System.ArgumentException: The tasks argument included a null value. (Parameter 'tasks') #68402
  • [wasm-threads] Don't hardcode PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE #68397
  • Console can allocate too much on the stack with a custom encoding #68395
  • Cannot run tests outside of nativeaot folder #68394
  • CI Test Failure: Wasm.Build.Tests.MainWithArgsTests.NonAsyncMainWithArgs #68393
  • #65738 causes SIGSEGV running helloworld on linux-x86 preview 3 #68391
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for ValueTypes in DebuggerProxyAttribute #68390
  • System.IO.Ports support for Android #68389
  • HostFxr fails to Initialize the host context when tried from a Native Code which is a Part of another .Net App #68388
  • Failure processing application bundle. Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #68387
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact/ToString: inconsistent handling of abbreviated month names (MMM) in culture de-DE #68385
  • Running dotnet test in libraries failing to execute net462 targets #68384
  • [QUIC] Support opening a new QUIC stream on the first connection that has streams available. #68380
    7.0.0
  • Test failed: GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd #68376
  • Make `mono` CSP Compliant #68374
  • HTTP/2: Possible race when receiving HEADERS and RST_STREAM together #68373
  • HttpResponseMessage.ToString() prints Content as an object #68369
  • Enterprise authentication tests are failing with PlatformNotSupportedException #68366
  • Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests fails on Android/iOS/tvOS #68360
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.MemorySendReceiveTest.SendReceive_Concurrent_Success test fails on CI #68359

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Mariomkas #68429
  • [release/7.0-preview3] Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #67558
  • Many libraries tests are not robust against line endings #66600
  • Arm64: Forward memset/memcpy to CRT implementation #67326
    7.0.0
  • Replace OSX_ARM64_ABI define with a runtime flag. #45501
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #67031
    7.0.0
  • Support system-wide enforcement of default authentication with proxy #66587
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out in the CI #64389
  • `Libraries Test Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug` failing to unzip test assets #67159
  • [NativeAOT arm64] application using sha1 and sha2 Instruction Sets does nothing and quits #68315
  • System.Net.Security.Tests ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails on Server 2022 #65098
    7.0.0
  • BinaryData.Empty.ToString throws ArgumentNullException #68262
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RetryOnConnectionFailure #61257
    Future
  • Read_Archive_File failing due to access denied to tar/pax/file.tar #68357
  • Rolling build CI failure: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWithTests.LongContinuationChain_Await_DoesNotStackOverflow #67768
  • [API Proposal]: Get info about generic attributes #64169
    7.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics tests failed with "almost" empty logs #67233

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    community-contribution
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Fix debugging wasm sample #68421
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: run remorph stress before fgRemoveDeadBlocks #68420
  • Fix entry point for waveOutGetDevCaps #68418
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add more diagnostics to intermittently failing assert in JSON #68414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix header upgrade-insecure-requests name #68412
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix potential stack overflow in StdInReader #68398
    area-System.Console
  • Consolidate `MessageBox` API usage #68396
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Copy the LLVM jobs into their own pipeline #68392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixing and improving the `BOX;BR[COND]` pattern match #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable runtime tests on Windows ARM64v8 queues #68377
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add retries to some FSW tests #68368
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Removed GT_MSUB in favor of a simple containment check. #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • fixes in transition blowup and removing recursion from RegexNode conversion #68307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #68417
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Implement `fgSetTreeSeq` via `GenTreeVisitor` #68383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat `INDEX` as a potentially throwing operation #68381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleaning up write barrier code #68124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added Fixes for LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests and Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #68303
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • add support for parsing empty user and password as DefaultCredentials #68312
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove DEBUG_ARG_SLOTS #68319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid passing gshared methods to the jit_done callback. #68404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Build rolling release jits #68229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid stress log shutdown race condition #64722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename superpmi-asmdiffs -> superpmi-diffs #68378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix lazy loop IndexOf optimization #68400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reduce pressure on backtracking stack in RegexCompiler / source generator #68364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix a randomly failing JS test #67945
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure floating-point types write the exponent/significand as little-endian #68331
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Backport new Tar APIs #68337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix managed/unmanaged mismatch in arm64 NativeAOT definitions of required instruction sets #68375
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix unintentional boxing on every newline in GetCharKindWithAnchor #68370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests on mobile #68362
    area-System.IO
  • BinaryData.Empty.ToString throws ArgumentNullException #68349
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • If the user has < 65 cores and passes in an affinitized range for the 0th CPU group, if valid, honor it. #68283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow sharing of input tar file for read #68361
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove MarshalUsingAttribute when System.AggressiveAttributeTrimming is on #68350
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, linkable-framework
  • Remove unused libs.packages subset #68345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings in System.Private.Xml due to two PRs that raced #68358
    area-Meta
  • Remove SystemNative_GetUnixName() PAL function #68342
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-diffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Faster vsd hashtables #67609
    area-VM-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Android Docker build image #68354
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #67848
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mark only first indirection of block copies as faulting #67747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Postpone dispose of sendContentCacnellationToken for HTTP3 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http, no-recent-activity
  • Don't build non shared framework refs in ref build #68275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing #68258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call methods with byref parameters, e.g. this #1873

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CoreCLR failed to build with error NETSDK1182 with MSVC on windows amd64. #25005

Closed

  • MSBuild 17.0+ is required on ubuntu 20.04 #25024

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to update a couple of more versions of the cryptography file #25023
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lingering use of System.Private.Uri v.old #25021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update SDK to 6.0.4 #25018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Fix pack for static web assets in cross-targeting scenarios #25011
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Assign names to arguments for nuget commands #25001
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add new propertygroup #24996
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • update exception message #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try to lock the mono manifest file to figure out which tests are upda… #24932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow file changes from tar as it's just a warning #24971
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure all UsingNode overloads verify diagnostics #60915
    Compiler.Next
  • Visual Studio should take global using directives (e.g. ImplicitUsings) into account when creating new C# files #60912
  • Intellisense Method Paramter list to wrap not truncate #60911
  • NullReferenceException in PdbSourceDocumentLoaderService.cs line 130 #60908
  • Invalid IL produced for an unused struct load from a `ref` local #60905
    Compiler.Next
  • CA1822 "Make static" code fix does not respect csharp_preferred_modifier_order #60903
  • IDE0060 should not activate when a base member is hidden with `new` #60902
  • Feature request: propagate [UnconditionalSuppressMessage] to compiler-generated methods in the nested lexical scope #60898
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • VSIX deployment fails with IOException #60031
    17.2
  • Add Ability to Embed netmodules #60503
  • Test plan for "auto-default structs" #60167
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use dotnet bot instead of vslsnap for insertions #60917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #60914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Change VS insertions to use dotnet-bot account #60907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • Optimize allocations in batch queue processing #60901
    Area-IDE
  • Store incremental data in AVL tree instead of array #60900
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly set the TemplateSelector of inheritance margin. #60899
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Fix CI in main #60916
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Verify conversion kinds in native int conversion tests #60895
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Respect test requests to expedite processing in solution crawler. #60886
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60897
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resolve cyclic dependencies between Http.Results and Http.Extensions #41330
  • Generic host/kestrel known cases proper error handling #41328
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41327
  • W3CLogging file rotation seems to be deleting files out of order #41326
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor webassembly App: Cannot call unknown function mono_wasm_set_is_debugger_attached, make sure it is exported #41324
  • Profile Blazor WASM using Mono log profiler #41321
  • Caching StackExchangeRedis throws exception when using Twemproxy #41320
    7.0-preview5
  • Need report exception when model deserialize failed #41322
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer dependencies (Duende.IdentityServer) #41315
  • MultipartReader.ReadNextSectionAsync() causes error "Unexpected end of Stream" #41313

Closed

  • When sending MultipartFormDataContent from HttpClient, the MediaTypeHeaderValue.TryParse does not handle multipart boundary value enclosed with quotes correctly #41237
    7.0-preview5
  • UnauthorizedAccessException when building .net core 6.0 project on MacOS #41307
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction, mvc #41316
  • Blazor Wasm benchmarks not working #41302
  • Blazor Server events generate a lots of network traffic in Edge DevTools #41294
  • Delegated Authorisation Scheme causing Posted body to be null #41318
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding typescript output to static web assets #41279
  • ASP.NET Core *. StaticWebAssets.xml get unexpectedly deleted in the dependent project's output directory on build #35345
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server - many comments rendered in html output #41293
  • Client Certificate is discarded on TLS 1.3+IIS hosting #41162
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40628
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime
  • Debug `dotnet restore` problems #41331
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-runtime
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Stick w/ `$(RepositoryCommit)` #41314
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • Remove quotes from MultipartReader boundary #41308
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix Blazor Wasm benchmarks #41312
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview5
  • Unqurantine "Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess" #41304
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Unify initialization in DefaultHttpContextFactory #41333
    area-runtime
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41310
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add linefeed terminator support #41269
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TextColor of RadioButton seems to be always black for Mac Catalyst, despite setting it in constructor with e.g. new RadioButton { TextColor = Color.FromRgb(255, 0, 0), ... } #6430
  • ViewHandler mapper extension methods won't reliably fire if mapper methods are replaced #6429
    6.0.300
  • Resizetizer rotates large images #6426
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Blazor template (WinUI 3) does not display WebView2 Runtime download link #6421
    6.0.300
  • Grid doesn't dynamically size when content size changes #6420
  • Adding an image file to Resources/Images folder gets incorrectly set as AndroidResource Build Action #6418
  • Light up .NET MAUI Item Templates for .NET MAUI Solution #6416
    6.0.300-servicing
  • DeviceTest: InvalidImageSourceFailsToLoad needs to be fixed and re-enabled #6415
    .NET 7
  • [iOS] Width or height of Editor control can't be set #6414
  • Inconsistent behavior with RTL flow direction for custom layout #6413
  • Vertical Scrolling is hard/Practically unusable for a CollectionView inside a CarouselView #6412
  • A single way to override the back button behavior #6410
  • FlyoutPage issues on macOS #6408
  • RC1 - NumberOfTapsRequired fails when greater than 2 (Xamarin.Forms legacy issue) #6407
  • Shell.TitleView not working on Android and have issues on Iphone #6406
  • ViewModel in Page .NET MAUI RC1 - Signed apk installed in device. #6405
  • (Windows) RC1 - RefreshView does not appear when swiping down with mouse #6404
  • [iOS] DatePicker does not display initial value #6402
  • (Windows) RC1 - SwipeView - Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt #6401
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • (Windows) RC1 - LayoutCycleException when maximizing window #6400
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Shell.NavBarHasShadow is not working #6399
  • "\bin\Debug\net6.0-windows10.0.19041\win10-x64\xxxxx.appxrecipe" is missing or malformed. #6398
  • After installing .NET 7 preview everything MAUI related disappears #6396
  • Run on iOS Physical Device - error MT1216: Could not find the simulator UDID #6395
  • Blazor Hybrid Publishing Validation #6393
    6.0.300

Closed

  • Grid within a Grid is not size constrained correctly #4724
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [mauipalooza] Layout width is wrong and elements are misaligned #5949
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Strange Picker behaviour when used in NavigationPage #2349
    6.0.300
  • Please add FontIcon #3894
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor of ContentPage not being updated on AppThemeBinding update #5681
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android 11] Behavior does not modify properties of attached object when modification occurs in an EventHandler #4516
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • AppThemeBinding not working (p11/p12) #4335
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Custom theme ResourceDictionary not working #4143
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Image binding not updating on iOS #1086
    6.0.300
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on native apps #6067
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • StreamImageSource doesn't work on Image Control #6231
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Large Images Not Shown Correctly #5938
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI Hot Reload Not Working in VS 2022 17.2.0 Preview 3 #6403
  • Application.Current.Windows maintains incorrect count #6103
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Publishing a Windows app doesn't produce an msix #5884
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Embedded images not render in Android Maui #6228
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Changing Label Value at Runtime makes the label invisible #6100
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • TabbedPage running on Android Emulator - Unhandled Exception #6349
    6.0.300-rc.3

Created

  • Generate MSIX when publishing #6262
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.3

    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Use a different property name for dependabot #6423
  • Use a variable for the Svg.* package versions #6355
  • Fix android image loading into views #6394
    platform/android 🤖, control-image, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Throw exception if users uses incompatible pages #6390
    area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Properly restore styleValue after ClearValue #6379

Updated

  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985

  • Fix FlyoutIsPresented permutations #6388

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LINQ expression could not be translated #27870
  • First migration after upgrading to .NET 6 doesn't handle indexes #27868
  • Query throws ArgumentException with unhelpful message (ICollection[type] does not match the corresponding member type [type]) #27867
  • Allow for deferred concurrency check by using token's manually set value rather than value at time of retrieval #27865
  • How to make a method generic using lambda expressions? #27864
  • Migrations SQL script (npgsql) truncates some identifiers to 64 not 63 characters #27862
  • Improve the experience of working with spatial types using OData and EF Core #27861
    Backlog
  • Migration inconsistently generates nullable columns for derived classes (TPH) #27859

Closed

  • Release a hotfix for TPT Check Constraint Duplication Issue in new patch release of EF Core 6.0 #27860
  • Migration EF6 to EF Core -> Client-Eval of Top-level projection LINQ #27846

PullRequests

Created

  • Suppress uninitialized DbSet warnings when a ctor is present #27869

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
  • [6.0.x] Return null constraint names for keys and FKs on entity types not mapped to a table. #27857
    Servicing-consider
  • Reduce SaveChanges roundtrips #27713

entry.content:
Issues
